actions.open:
if:
  a: current_entity.properties.locked
  op: ==
  b: false
  exec:
    set:
      field: current_entity.properties.open
      value: true
    show_content: current_entity.properties.contents
else:
  display_text:
    text: It is locked
actions.close:
set:
  field: current_entity.properties.open
  value: false
display_text:
  text: You close it.
actions.lock:
set:
  field: flags.loop_found_val
  value: false
if#canlock:
  a: current_entity.properties.can_lock
  op: ==
  b: false
  exec:
    display_text:
      text: This entity cannot be locked
else:
  for:
    iter: player.inventory
    exec:
      if:
        a: current_item.id
        op: ==
        b: STR:key
        exec:
          if:
            a: current_item.lock_id
            op: ==
            b: current_entity.properties.key_id
            exec:
              break: null
              set#flag:
                field: flags.loop_found_val
                value: true
              if:
                a: current_entity.properties.open
                op: ==
                b: true
                exec:
                  display_text:
                    text: Close it first
              else:
                set#locked:
                  field: current_entity.properties.locked
                  value: true
                display_text:
                  text: Locked
  if#keyfound:
    a: flags.loop_found_val
    op: ==
    b: false
    exec:
      display_text:
        text: You do not have the correct key
actions.unlock:
set:
  field: flags.loop_found_val
  value: false
for:
  iter: player.inventory
  exec:
    if:
      a: current_item.id
      op: ==
      b: STR:key
      exec:
        if:
          a: current_item.lock_id
          op: ==
          b: current_entity.properties.key_id
          exec:
            set#locked:
              field: current_entity.properties.locked
              value: false
            display_text:
              text: Unlocked
            set#flag:
              field: flags.loop_found_val
              value: true
            break: null
if:
  a: flags.loop_found_val
  op: ==
  b: false
  exec:
    display_text:
      text: You do not have the correct key
actions.gather:
if:
  a: current_entity.properties.open
  op: ==
  b: true
  exec:
    for:
      iter: current_entity.properties.contents
      exec:
        add:
          field: player.inventory
          value_template: current_item
        remove:
          field: current_entity.properties.contents
          idx: 0
    display_text:
      text: You pick up the items
else:
  display_text:
    text: Open it first
